content: I am researcher at Earth observatory of Singapore. In my PhD, I studied the transient creep of olivine and olivine bearing rocks using data from laboratory experiments. I applied the laboratory knowledge to study postseismic deformation following the 2012 Mw 8.6 Indian Ocean earthquake.
summary: I am researcher at Earth observatory of Singapore. In my PhD, I studied the transient creep of olivine and olivine bearing rocks using data from laboratory experiments. I applied the laboratory knowledge to study postseismic deformation following the 2012 Mw 8.
title: Sagar Masuti
